desc: Empowering Restaurants with Digital Ordering & Payment

features.title: Tackle Labor Shortages & Optimize Operations
details: Serve More Customers with a Leaner Team
subDetails: Minimize wait times and eliminate long queues with a flexible service model. Both guests and servers can open and modify tabs, ensuring orders are instantly relayed to the kitchen for faster fulfillment.
Seamless POS integration allows you to make instant menu updates. Remove unavailable items or experiment with new pricing effortlessly, no need for costly and time-consuming menu reprints.
Streamline the payment process for both guests and staff. With Apple Pay integration, customers can complete their transactions in as little as 10 seconds, making checkout smoother than ever.

features.title: Boost Revenue and Check Size While Minimizing Losses
details: Cut Down on Comps and Voids
subDetails: Restaurants using Bestpos Mobile Order & Pay typically experience a 10% boost in revenue³, thanks to a more efficient and engaging ordering process.

Orders placed through Bestpos Mobile Order & Pay™ tend to be 9% larger than traditional dine-in orders⁴. With intuitive item descriptions, filters, and easy menu customization, guests naturally upsell themselves.
By allowing guests to place their own orders directly from their devices, restaurants can significantly reduce costly errors, unnecessary comps, and voided transactions.

features.title: Leverage Guest Data to Drive Repeat Business
subDetails: Gain valuable customer insights from every transaction and use them to fuel targeted marketing campaigns. With strategic email marketing, restaurants can generate up to $2,800 in additional sales per campaign⁵.
Encourage repeat visits by seamlessly prompting guests to join your loyalty program during checkout, increasing sign-ups and long-term engagement.

Make data-driven decisions with insights from Bestpos Performance Center. Get a weekly breakdown of top-selling items, guest favorites, and underperforming dishes to refine your menu for maximum profitability.
